nodes.text: Borke's Cantina was a cantina located in Drepplin, the capital city of the planet Glova.

Owned by Borke Valkanhayn, its prices were average, making the cantina a place frequented, including by the New Republic Agent Trask Lucan. It was primarily used to launder money from his "importing" business. There was initially a small danger from legal authorities, but Borke makes a small "contribution" to the operating funds of several important officials, and this hasn't been a problem anymore.
